headline.main: Pakistan to Open Afghan Crossings Closed in Wake of Attacks
headline.print_headline: Pakistan to Open Afghan Crossings Closed in Wake of Attacks

lead_paragraph: Pakistan said Monday it will temporarily open two border crossings with Afghanistan that were closed after a string of militant attacks, while a new wave of assaults targeting several military posts near the porous frontier killed six Pakistani soldiers.
